methods.name: glm::closestPointOnLine
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &point=P, const glm::vec3 &a=P, const glm::vec3 &b=P
methods.short:
Find the point on a straight line which is the closet of a point.

See also: gtx_closest_point

methods.parameters: const glm::vec2 &point=P, const glm::vec2 &a=P, const glm::vec2 &b=P
